Title: A Rickle in Time
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Matt Roller, Mike McMahan (story editor), David Phillips (story editor), Matt Roller (story editor), Brian Wysol (story editor), Eric Acosta (staff writer), Tom Kauffman (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Having restarted time, Rick, Morty and Summer are in a quantum-uncertain state of existence. An argument leads to the creation of two alternate timelines, which need to be stitched back together fast if they are to escape quantum collapse.
